responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I am fine!, How about you?
Great job today! See ya tomorrow
Chara, your assistant for the day!
Understandable, You've had quite the day. Try taking a small break
Maybe try doing 20 jumping jacks to get your heart pumping! That should do the trick!
Dehydrated? I hereby order you to drink a glass of water!

patterns: How many tasks do I have today
responses: Check the list section on the app

patterns: What do I use you for?
responses: I am here to provide support to any questions you may have regarding this app and also to provide advice on what you can do to make it easier to stay organised in your life working from home!

The creator of this app are Mei Chen and Jessica Daly! Both played a big role in creating this app. Mei worked primarily on the programming of the app. Jessica worked primarily on the UX design of the app. Many hours of going through tutorials, debugging errors, testing different softwares and learning new tools were involved in this! We have both thoroughly enjoyed the process of making this app and have learnt A LOT!!!
